org.openimaj.image.connectedcomponent.proc

Class ColourDescriptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.image.connectedcomponent.proc.ColourDescriptor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FeatureVectorProvider<DoubleFV>, org.openimaj.image.processor.connectedcomponent.ConnectedComponentProcessor

    public class ColourDescriptor
extends Object
implements org.openimaj.image.processor.connectedcomponent.ConnectedComponentProcessor, FeatureVectorProvider<DoubleFV>
    Descriptors based on the first-order statistics of the colour of pixel values in an image.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
